channel.title: Reaper Quest "Over the Edge"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Reaper Quest "Over the Edge"" - I need help!

item.title: Re: Reaper Quest "Over the Edge"
item.content:encoded: It used to be that you were required to do the quest within 15 minutes of 72 hours from when you initiated the quest; That has since long been changed to allow you to complete it any time after 72 hours have passed.

item.title: Re: Reaper Quest "Over the Edge"
item.content:encoded: i do believe that it would be best to get it about 5 minutes after the time you got to viewing that specific page (i did it when it was tightly constrained) but from what i know it needs to be at least 72 hours.

item.title: Reaper Quest "Over the Edge"
item.content:encoded: Now I know it says that I have to wait 72 hours before continuing the quest, but does it have to be exactly 72 hours? Or does it just have to be at least 72 hours?
